name: Pozione dendrocida
desc:
A potion that boosts Dendro RES and suppresses the growth of plants.

Rather than killing the plants, it puts them in deep hibernation. It's also said to be good for the body if ingested.

value.text: Increases all party members' <color=#99ff88>Dendro RES</color> by 25% for 300s.

value.name: Rosa di Sumeru
value.desc: Bright and beautiful, these pure purple flowers give off a pleasant fragrance that will give any passerby pause. While some like to call this a type of "rambler rose," its relative lack of multiple flowers means that it falls under a different floral classification.

value.name: Nucleo cristallino
value.desc: The core of a crystal butterfly. It absorbs elemental energy that has escaped into the atmosphere.
